sentences.en: After about three months, I was no longer addicted to nicotine.
sentences.cn: 大约3个月后，我就不再对尼古丁上瘾了。

sentences.en: He was passionately addicted to pop music.
Henrietta was at this time more than ever addicted to fine criticism.
sentences.cn: 亨利艾塔比以前更喜欢作道德说教.

sentences.en: Like the morphine fiend , he was becoming addicted to his ease.
sentences.cn: 就像吗啡鬼一样, 他对贪图安乐上了瘾.

sentences.en: Many of the women are addicted to heroin and cocaine.
sentences.cn: 这些妇女中的很多吸食海洛因和可卡因成瘾。

sentences.en: Many smokers who are chemically addicted to nicotine cannot cut down easily.
sentences.cn: 许多有尼古丁瘾的抽烟人不容易把烟戒掉.

sentences.en: My children are hopelessly addicted to television.
sentences.cn: 我的几个孩子都成了电视迷,简直是不可救药了.

sentences.en: She had become addicted to golf.
sentences.cn: 她已经迷上高尔夫球了。

sentences.en: She had become addicted to tranquillizers.
sentences.cn: 她吃镇静剂已经上瘾了.
她对巴比妥酸盐产生了依赖性。

sentences.en: She's become addicted to love stories.
Smokers who inhale are likely to become addicted to nicotine.
sentences.cn: 吸烟的人容易对尼古丁上瘾.

sentences.en: They were evicted from their apartment after their mother became addicted to drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们的母亲吸毒上瘾后，他们被从公寓里赶了出来。

trans.tran_en: liking something so much that you do not want to stop doing it or having it
